text: Interesting, three generic Python in the last round includijg read the docs, matplotlib

elements.text: Interesting, three generic Python in the last round includijg read the docs, matplotlib

text: I kind of agree... the projects seemed tangentially related to biomedical science. Thanks for sharing this though, I think I’m going to submit something for my Julia package. I do research in biomedical optics so seems like a good fit!
